Texts.Eng:
Swift and dangerous snake-people. Their efficient metabolisms allow them to function on almost no food, and their powerful tails give them a mighty spring in their step.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Carnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.2^reset;, +^green;12^reset;% Jump, -^green;50^reset;% Hunger Drain
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;10^reset;% Physical, +^green;20^reset;% Fire, +^green;30^reset;% Poison and Shadow resists
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Jungle, Black Tar

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  When high in energy, gain increased Crit Chance with Bows
  Bow: Damage x^green;1.25^reset; and +^green;20^reset;% Speed
  Chakram: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, Health x^green;1.1^reset; and +^green;12^reset;% Knockback Resist
  Dual Chakram: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;
  Whip: +^green;6^reset; Defense

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.8^reset;
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;40^reset;% Ice, -^red;20^reset;% Cosmic
